tool_description: A powerful and reliable API for LinkedIn scraping: profiles, posts, companies, jobs, employee search, company search, and more. This API scrapes data directly from LinkedIn upon request, providing you with real-time information – no stale or cached data. Trusted by numerous AI startups around the world.
name: Fresh LinkedIn Profile Data
title: Fresh LinkedIn Profile Data

api_list.name: Get Personal Profile
api_list.description: Get full profile data, including experience & education history, skillset and company related details. Accept all type of profile urls. **1 credit per call.**

api_list.name: Search Jobs
api_list.description:
Search jobs posted on LinkedIn. This endpoint is useful for scraping job openings of a specific company on LinkedIn. 

To scrape all results from each search, change the param *start* from 0 to 25, 50, ... until you see less than 25 results returned.

**2 credits per call.**

optional_parameters.name: experience_level
optional_parameters.description: Possible values: internship, associate, director, entry level, mid-senior level, executive

optional_parameters.name: geo_code
optional_parameters.description:
Use this param to target jobs in specific region/country. To search worldwide, use 92000000.
To find other geo codes, please follow this [link](https://rapidapi.com/freshdata-freshdata-default/api/fresh-linkedin-profile-data/tutorials/how-to-find-a-geo_code-(geoid)-on-linkedin%3F)

optional_parameters.name: industry_code
optional_parameters.description: You can find all valid industry codes from [this page]( https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/linkedin/shared/references/reference-tables/industry-codes).

optional_parameters.name: title_id
optional_parameters.description: To find title_id by title, please follow this [link](https://rapidapi.com/freshdata-freshdata-default/api/fresh-linkedin-profile-data/tutorials/how-to-find-a-title_id-on-linkedin%3F)

optional_parameters.name: function_id
optional_parameters.description: Please follow [this instruction](https://rapidapi.com/freshdata-freshdata-default/api/fresh-linkedin-profile-data/tutorials/how-to-find-a-function_id-on-linkedin%3F) to get the function_id of your choice.

optional_parameters.name: date_posted
optional_parameters.description: Possible values: any_time,  past_month, past_week, past_24_hours

api_list.name: Get Company by Domain
api_list.description: Find a company on LinkedIn using its web domain. **1 credit per call.**

api_list.name: Get Company by URL
api_list.description: Given a company’s LinkedIn URL, the API will return valuable data points in JSON format. **1 credit per call.**

api_list.name: Get Company's Posts
api_list.description: Get posts from a LinkedIn company page.  Pagination is supported to fetch all posts. **2 credits per call.**

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: Use this param to fetch posts of the next result page: 0 for page 1, 50 for page 2, etc.

optional_parameters.name: pagination_token
optional_parameters.description: Required when fetching the next result page. Please use the token from the result of your previous call.

api_list.name: Get Profile's Posts
api_list.description: Get posts of a person based on profile url. Pagination is supported to get all posts. **2 credits per call.**

optional_parameters.name: pagination_token
optional_parameters.description: Required when fetching the next result page. Please use the token from the result of your previous call.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description:
Possible values: 

- posts: to scrape posts from tab Posts -- posts or posts reshared by the person

- comments: to scrape posts from tab Comments -- posts the person commented

- reactions: to scrape posts from tab Reactions -- posts the person reacted

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: Use this param to fetch posts of the next result page: 0 for page 1, 50 for page 2, etc.

api_list.name: Get Company by ID
api_list.description: Given a company’s LinkedIn internal ID, the API will return valuable data points in JSON format. **1 credit per call.**

api_list.name: Get Pesonal Profile by Sales Nav URL
api_list.description: Get full profile data, including experience & education history, skillset and company related details. **1 credit per call.**

api_list.name: Get Extra Profile Data
api_list.description: Get more profile’s data fields like languages, top skills, certifications, publications, patents, awards

api_list.name: Get Profile PDF CV
api_list.description: Get the CV of a LinkedIn profile in PDF format. **1 credit per call.**

api_list.name: Get Profile Recent Activity Time
api_list.description: Get the time of the latest activity. **2 credits per call.**

api_list.name: Get Open Profile Status
api_list.description: Given a LinkedIn profile URL, the API will let you know if that profile is “open profile” or not. **1 credit per call.**

api_list.name: Get Company Ads Count
api_list.description: Get number of ads the company posted on LinkedIn. **1 credit per call.**

api_list.name: Get Open to Work Status
api_list.description: Given a LinkedIn profile URL, the API will let you know if that profile is “open to work” or not. **1 credit per call.**

api_list.name: Get Recommendation Received
api_list.description: Get profile’s recommendations (received). **1 credit per call**.

api_list.name: Get Years of Experience
api_list.description: Get the total number of years of experience of a profile.

api_list.name: Get Recommendation Given
api_list.description: Get profile’s recommendations (given). **1 credit per call**.

api_list.name: Get Crunchbase Details
api_list.description: Get all public details of a company on Crunchbase - including funding rounds. **2 credits per call.**

api_list.name: Get Search Companies Result
api_list.description: Get search results. Please make sure the search is "done" before calling this endpoint.

api_list.name: Check Search Companies Status
api_list.description: Get the status of your search using the request_id given in step 1.

api_list.name: Get Job Details
api_list.description: Scrape the full job details, including the company basic information. **1 credit per call.**

optional_parameters.name: include_skills
optional_parameters.description: Including skills will cost 1 more credit

api_list.name: Get Company Jobs Count
api_list.description: Get number of opening jobs the company posted on LinkedIn. **1 credit per call.**

api_list.name: Check Search Status
api_list.description: Get the status of your search using the request_id given in step 1.

api_list.name: Get Search Results
api_list.description: Get search results. Please make sure the search is "done" before calling this endpoint.
